description.displayText: She is incredibly responsible, caring, and attentive with children. She has endless patience and always finds creative ways to keep kids entertained and safe. Plus, she is punctual and trustworthy
description.originalText: She is incredibly responsible, caring, and attentive with children. She has endless patience and always finds creative ways to keep kids entertained and safe. Plus, she is punctual and trustworthy

description.displayText: Natalya is an excellent childcare provider - we recommended her to many of our friends in Montreal prior to her moving out of town. We especially liked her cooking and teaching them some kitchen skills after school, and occasionally she would help our youngest with her homework!
description.originalText: Natalya is an excellent childcare provider - we recommended her to many of our friends in Montreal prior to her moving out of town. We especially liked her cooking and teaching them some kitchen skills after school, and occasionally she would help our youngest with her homework!

description.displayText: Natalya is an outstanding childcare provider. She is experienced working with kids of all ages and will go the extra mile to make sure they have a fun and enriching time with her, from organizing intellectually stimulating activities, to encouraging their creativity, hobbies and passions, to lending a compassionate and non-judgmental ear to whatever challenges they are going through. Her skills in wilderness first aid ensures that she can maintain the safety health of clients that is always her top priority. Her side hobby cooking exquisite meals is an added bonus. In addition to keeping your children safe, entertained, and engaged, Natalya will provide them with a true friend and an inspiring role model. Anyone fortunate enough to have the opportunity to enlist Natalya's services will discover them to be a true blessing for both themselves and for their children!

Her skills in wilderness first aid ensures that she can maintain the safety health of clients that is always her top priority. Her side hobby cooking exquisite meals is an added bonus. In addition to keeping your children safe, entertained, and engaged, Natalya will provide them with a true friend and an inspiring role model. description.displayText: Natalya helped me with my (then) 8-year old daughter S for almost a year. She came over in the evening a few days a week, and helped S with her homework and made dinner while I would get some work done. Natalya did an amazing job entertaining my daughter without any screen time. When they weren't doing homework, Natalya would come up with fun, imaginative games. I would definitely recommend Natalya as a sitter! She's also an amazing cook and definitely taught S a lot about cooking.

description.displayText: I highly recommend Natalya as a nanny! She has taken care of my nieces and nephew and they absolutely love her. She's fun, engaging, and always treats kids with kindness and respect. She never talks down to them. Plus, she's an amazing cook which is always a bonus! Any family would be lucky to have her as their nanny.
description.originalText: I highly recommend Natalya as a nanny! She has taken care of my nieces and nephew and they absolutely love her. She's fun, engaging, and always treats kids with kindness and respect. She never talks down to them. Plus, she's an amazing cook which is always a bonus! Any family would be lucky to have her as their nanny.

description.displayText: Natalya worked with me at a summer camp in Ontario. She is a highly responsible, organized and authentic leader. She always went above and beyond to enrich the lives of children on her trips by sharing her wealth of knowledge for the outdoors and the natural world. She has a vibrant personality and a warm demeanour- it was a real pleasure and privilege to work along side her with young people. I have no doubt in her ability to work with young people of all ages and you will be lucky to have her.
